elements.content: Catalytically active lead(II)–imidazolium coordination assemblies with diversified lead(II) coordination geometries†IIII Chatla Naga Babu Paladugu Suresh Katam Srinivas Arruri Sathyanarayana Natarajan Sampath and Ganesan Prabusankar II11–33–74II567II7II1–7II8IIII841Flexible, semi flexible and rigid imidazolium carboxylate ligands used in the present study.988Top: The distorted pentagonal pyramidal geometry of lead(II) in 1. Bottom: Views of the 2D structure of 1 down the c-axis emphasizing the 20-member metallacyclic ring.II9(i) The solid state structure of 2 showing the orientation of the hexa nuclear lead cluster. Anions, hydrogen atoms and water molecules have been omitted for clarity. (ii) Core structure of hexa nuclear lead cluster. (iii) Polyhedral sharing of hexa nuclear lead cluster. (iv) The geometry of lead(II) centres in 2.
